overview:
• Managing Successful Programmes Practitioner (MSP)
  • PRINCE 2 practitioner
  • SCRUM Master and Practitioner (CSM and CSP) - Agile software development certification

I have 12 years of project management experience. I am a certified Scrum Master, certified Scrum Practitioner, PMP, MSP Practitioner and PRINCE 2 Practitioner. I have an excellent track record at delivering complex technical and multilingual projects, programmes and applications. I have managed budgets up to Â£8 million with multiple concurrent projects and programmes. I have been consistently successful at implementing technical processes and defining growth plans and initiatives for effective process optimisation across the board. I am a good communicator and motivator and this has helped me build and train successful project management teams. I am very conscientious about the quality of my work and my teamâ€™s work and always ensure effective tracking and reporting of my programmes and deliverables.
